name: Swipe Elements Matching Puzzle
description:
Swipe Elements is a very addictive puzzle game.
Match 3 or more moving elements of the same type to make them disappear.
This game is a combination of match3 and chess.
Logic is your main weapon in this awesome character puzzle game.

Play throughout 90 levels, in 3 different scenarios: Forest, Dust and Ice Period.
Play Swipe Elements if you need colorful time killer.
Play Switch Elements while waiting for a cab.
Play Swap Elements Puzzle while waiting for your appointment with the doctor.

Every box to switch and move is a character with it's own mood.
6 types of elements available: Water, Fire, Earth, Air, Crystal and Gold.
Pass throughout levels to meet all kinds of box and swap them.

Features:
- 90+ levels and more in future.
- Compete with your friends and strangers in the leaderboard!
- Earn rewards!
- Excellent music and sounds.
- 3 scenarios and more soon.
- Nice elements.

Test you logic skills in this matching puzzle game.
Play Swipe Elements now!
